kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.
Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.arg: Does the page contain expected text? ${page_contains}
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Fail
kw.arg: Expected text: ${exp_text} not found in the page text: ${page_text}
kw.doc: Fails the test with the given message and optionally alters its tags.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.arg: Expected text: ${exp_text} found in the page text: ${page_text}
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.
